channel.title: Bootstrapped.fm ep. 102 - "I’m Running On Fumes"
channel.description:
In this episode we discuss parenting at the park, hiring a plumber, cutting & bulking > marketing, the awesomeness of [Peers Conference](http://peersconf.com/2018), hiring a contractor for [Scribbleton](https://scribbleton.com/), & more.
[Listen to the episode here.](http://bootstrapped.fm/2018/04/15/102-im-running-on-fumes/)
Thanks to Linode for sponsoring this episode. [Sign up today and get $20 off.](https://linode.com/bootstrappedfm/?utm_source=bootstrapped&utm_medium=podcast&utm_content=20%20dollar&utm_campaign=bootstrapped2016)
![Capture|614x475](upload://ihkQ8TNvPphSeCioUBOYAFGFPd4.jpg)

item.title: Bootstrapped.fm ep. 102 - "I’m Running On Fumes"
item.dc:creator: SteveMcLeod
item.description:
There’s some good discussion in the second half of this episode about finding and using freelancers, and the natural (but unhelpful) reluctance to delegate.
